context.p: On the New payment type page, you can add the payment types to be available for a supplier or reseller organization. The payment types defined here can later be made available for selection by customers.

step.cmd: From the Payment service provider list, select the PSP that offers the payment type that you want to assign to the selected supplier or reseller organization.

info.p: The list contains all PSPs registered and configured on your platform.

step.cmd: In the PSP identifier field, enter the identifier or account number for the supplier or reseller as provided by the PSP.
step.info: Suppliers and resellers need to have a contractual relationship with the PSP. The PSP configures the channel for a supplier or reseller and issues an identifier, usually an account number, so that payments can be immediately linked to the supplier's or reseller's account.

step.cmd: Select the types of payment that the selected supplier or reseller may offer to his customers.
step.info: Next to Payment, you see the payment types offered by the selected PSP. The available payment types depend on the configuration of the PSP.

step.cmd: To save your entries, click Save.

p.note: You can no longer remove a payment type which has been assigned to a supplier or reseller organization.

result.p: You are returned to the page for managing the organization.
